name: Lift (Lift - VR)
description:
Lift is a narrative VR game on the HTC Vive, where the player takes on the role of an elevator operator in an hotel beyond it's prime,  in the final 5 days of the hotel's existence. Using gestures, the player can interact with visitors of the hotel, and the conversations that occur take the player on a different journey every time.

Join us at the West Wind hotel!
